dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(pc.getLocationPlace().getPlaceType()==PLACE_TYPE_WORLD_MAP_GRASSLANDS) While most of your surroundings consist of open, natural meadows, it's impossible to keep your distance from the many hills, ponds, and valleys which are scattered throughout this grassland wilderness.​ These terrain features are almost always home to a significant amount of long grasses, scattered shrubs, and dense, bramble-packed thickets, which provide excellent spots from which a malicious foe might spring an ambush. #ELSE Although for the most part the landscape beside the road you're [pc.walking] down consists of wide open fields, you can never go far without passing some kind of small copse or thicket.​ These small clusters of trees are invariably home to many types of densely-packed shrubs and bushes, which provide excellent concealment for any potential foe that might be waiting to spring an ambush. #ENDIF

Just as you feared, as you're cautiously passing a small, isolated patch of woodland, [attacker.a_fullRace(true)] suddenly launches out of the undergrowth to block your passage. With a manic grin on her face, she points her [attacker.mainWeapon] at you and shouts, [attacker.speech(Stop right there, you filthy scum! You're trespassing on the territory of 'Lunette's Marauders', and you're going to fucking pay for it!)]

With her [attacker.hairColour] hair blowing in the breeze, this [attacker.race] locks her wild, [attacker.eyeColour] eyes on you and excitedly paws at this ground with one of her huge horse-like hoofs. As you look over her [attacker.skinColour] skin and [attacker.legColour] horse-hair, this demonic centauress, who stands at [attacker.heightValue], flexes her huge muscles in an attempt to intimidate you. Taking a bold step forwards, the marauder's crazed grin shifts into a terrifying snarl as she issues an ultimatum, [attacker.speech(You've got two choices! You can either pay the toll for travelling through my land, or submit to me and show me what a pathetic worm you are!)]

As she's clearly not afraid of a fight, you realise that you're going to have to either do as this sadistic [attacker.race] says or defeat her in combat before you can continue on your way...

#IF(pc.isCowardly()) Well and truly terrified at the prospect of this mighty [attacker.race] choosing to attack, you hastily grab [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames and offer them to her. Pleading for her not to be violent, you flinch and cry out as she delivers a swift smack across the back of your head. Snatching the money from your trembling [pc.hands], she snarls, [attacker.speech(You pathetic scum... You're lucky that I'm in a hurry today, or else I would have taken the time to punish you for your cowardice...)] #ELSEIF(pc.isBrave()) Unafraid of this mighty [attacker.race] or whatever violence she might choose to unleash, you tell her that you're in too much of a hurry to give her the beating she deserves. Grabbing [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames, you ignore the look of absolute fury upon the marauder's face and offer them to her. Avoiding a swift swipe that she takes at the back of your head, you tell the [attacker.race] not to do anything she'll regret as you let her snatch the money from your [pc.hands]. Incensed by your lack of fear, she furiously stomps her hoofs on the ground and shouts, [attacker.speech(You fucking scum! How dare you speak to me in such a manner! You're lucky that I'm in a hurry today, or else I would have taken the time to punish you for your insolence!)] #ELSE Not wanting to engage this mighty [attacker.race] in combat, you tell her that you'll pay the toll if it means that you can avoid a fight. Grabbing [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames, you offer them to the marauder and calmly let her snatch the money from your [pc.hands]. Seemingly incensed by your decision to pay her off, she furiously stomps her hoofs on the ground and shouts, [attacker.speech(You're lucky that I'm in a hurry today, or else I would have taken the time to give you a good beating!)] #ENDIF

With that, the [attacker.race] turns around on the spot and gallops off, sending clods of mud flying through the air behind her as she swiftly crosses a nearby field and disappears behind a hill. Happy with your decision to hand over [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0] flames in order to avoid fighting such an angry character, you look around to make sure that there's no other immediate danger and then prepare to continue on your way...

#IF(pc.hasFetish(FETISH_SUBMISSIVE)) Starting to feel turned on at the prospect of surrendering to this strong, dominant [attacker.race], you drop down onto the ground before her and tell her that you submit to her. #ELSE Not wanting to hand over any of your money, and equally unwilling to fight this strong, dominant [attacker.race], you drop down onto the ground before her and tell her that you submit to her. #ENDIF The marauder lets out an angry huff as she looks down at you, and, after stepping forwards, she lifts one of her huge hoofs and uses it to kick you down onto your back. With her face turned up into a furious snarl, she shouts, [attacker.speech(You worthless [pc.insult]! You're almost not even worth my time... Then again, it is rather fun to utterly dominate pathetic worms like yourself...)]

As you look up at this sadistic centauress, she once again kicks out with her hoof and sends you sprawling back onto the ground before her. Letting out a deep, mocking laugh, she looks down at you with a crazed grin on her face and demands, [attacker.speech(Come on then, [pc.insult]! Show me how you submit to your betters! I'm going to enjoy fucking you!)]

Given a moment in which to make a move, you quickly have to decide how best to submit to this demonic centauress...
